description: This file defines a middleware class for handling exceptions globally in an ASP.NET Core application, providing ocean-themed friendly error messages.

classes.name: ExceptionHandlingMiddleware
classes.description: Middleware for catching exceptions during HTTP request processing and returning friendly ocean-themed error messages.

methods.name: Invoke
methods.description: Main method that intercepts HTTP requests, executes the next middleware, and handles exceptions.

methods.name: WriteErrorAsync
methods.description: Helper method to serialize and write error responses with specified HTTP status code and message.
